text: Just like the previous upload from this game, this is a great ambient theme with some nice flute. Equinox wasn't really a favorite of mine, but I thought it had one of the best and most unique atmospheres on the SNES, thanks in a big part to the music.
author: SupraDarky

text: Never did much game play of this. I like the music here though. Holy Cow!
author: Marinanor

text: Hey SupraDarky, have you heard about a game called Black Sigil? You might cheer when you find out what it is... But then you might cringe when you see it. Might, though.
author: Jirt

text: @***** Well, from what I've heard and seen, it's not that good. It was made as a homage to Chrono Trigger (SD's most favourite game of all time), and was ruined with (from what I read off a few reviews) an annoying encounter rate, poor story, a flawed battle system, and some obvious bugs, including game-crashing ones. If you like Chrono Trigger's feel, it might give you some fun, but... Just be warned, you're going to be playing the game for the battle interface. Which you'll have, like, 95% of the time.
author: Jirt
